Title:
A new genus and four new species in /Psathyrella s.l. clade
from China
Abstract:
Based on traditional morphology, and phylogenetic analyses
(ITS, LSU, tef-1α and β-tub) of some Psathyrelloides specimens collected
from China, revealed this was unambiguously supported /Heteropsathyrella
clade could be regarded as monophyletic clade in the clade /Psathyrella
s.l. The monospecific genus Heteropsathyrella gen. nov. is introduced
for the single species, Heteropsathyrella macrocystidia, sp. nov., which
is placed in the new. In addition, Psathyrella amygdalinospora, P.
piluliformoides, and P. truncatisporoides are unique and distinct from
known species. The detailed description, colour photos, illustrations
are presented in this paper.
